name: Lotto Machine 4
description:
The first random number generator with a physics engine!

Lotto Machine is purely designed to help you pick your numbers for the lottery - sounds boring, right? Wrong! With a gorgeous UI, a spinning drum and physics & parallax that you can control with the accelerometer, now playing the lottery can be fun no matter the outcome!

You can choose how many numbers to pick, and how many numbers to pick from, so you can use it for non-lottery related purposes, even for games. Roll 6D20? Easy!

Bring a little fun into your life, and who knows - you might even win (and if you do, please let us know)!

Lotto Machine supports VoiceOver and high contrast modes, and we endeavor to be accessible to all.

----
